summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that validates the core components of a Cartesian Genetic Programming (CGP) library, including graph compilation, evolutionary strategies, genome manipulation, individual representation, population dynamics, primitive functions, utility helpers, and the highâ€‘level API across NumPy, PyTorch, and SymPy backends.
business_intent: Ensure the correctness, robustness, and performance of the CGP framework for evolutionary computation applications, enabling reliable integration and deployment in research and production environments.
